title: Canton Liberal F.C.
text:
Canton Liberal Football Club is a Welsh <a href="association%20football">football</a> team based in <a href="Canton%2C%20Cardiff">Canton</a>, <a href="Cardiff">Cardiff</a>, <a href="Wales">Wales</a>. They play in the <a href="South%20Wales%20Alliance%20League">South Wales Alliance League</a> Premier Division, which is in the fourth tier of the <a href="Welsh%20football%20league%20system">Welsh football league system</a>.
History.
The club was established in 2006, initially playing in the <a href="Cardiff%20%26amp%3B%20District%20League">Cardiff & District League</a>. In their first four seasons they won each divisional title. They were champions of the Premier Division in the 2012–13 season, joining the <a href="South%20Wales%20Amateur%20League">South Wales Amateur League</a> Division Two, where they were champions in 2014–15. They joined the newly formed <a href="South%20Wales%20Alliance%20League">South Wales Alliance League</a> for the 2015–16 season, and were again league champions, gaining promotion to the Premier Division for the 2016–17 season.
